alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Dodge; Fond du Lac; Green Lake (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 9:21PM CDT until July 28 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Milwaukee/Sullivan has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Fond du Lac County in east central Wisconsin... Green Lake County in south central Wisconsin... Eastern Columbia County in south central Wisconsin... Western Dodge County in southeastern Wisconsin... * Until 1015 PM CDT. * At 921 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles south of Wautoma to Pardeeville to near Spring Green, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Beaver Dam, Waupun, Ripon, Berlin, Columbus, Lodi, Poynette, Randolph, Fall River, Markesan, Princeton, Rosendale, Rio, Green Lake, Brandon, Cambria, Burnett, Fox Lake, Eldorado, and Alto. This includes the following Location Puckaway Lake. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. If you spot a tornado go at once into the basement or small central room in a sturdy structure. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Columbia; Dodge; Fond du Lac; Green Lake
